cause.description:
The Hopesmiths Project is a community of talented and passionate musicians, artists and business working together to raise money for Childhood Cancer Support. We have recently produced and released an acoustic cd which is available for purchase online.
Checkout www.hopesmiths.com for all the details!
1. Raising money for kids with cancer
2. Developing a community of passionate musicians and artists
cause.mission: Musicians Helping Kids With Leukemia and their families
